T.query: select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid, a.id as aid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id join lots l on i.lot_id = l.id join article_types a on l.article_type_id = a.id where (md.number is not null and md.number <> '' and d.study_id = 19 and d.id = 317 and i.status in (1,2,3,6)) or (md.name ='Depot5' and md.deleted='f' and d.study_id <500  and i.status in (1,2,3,6) and l.release_status = 2) ;

F.query: select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid, a.id as aid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id join lots l on i.lot_id = l.id join article_types a on l.article_type_id = a.id where (md.number is not null and md.number <> '' and d.study_id = 19 and d.id = 317 and i.status in (1,2,3)) or (md.name ='Depot5' and md.deleted='f' and d.study_id <500  and i.status in (1,2,3,6) and l.release_status = 2) ;

select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid, a.id as aid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id join lots l on i.lot_id = l.id join article_types a on l.article_type_id = a.id where (md.number is not null and md.number <> '' and d.study_id = 19 and d.id = 317 and i.status in (1,2,3,6) and i.quantity <10) or (md.name ='Depot5' and md.deleted='f' and d.study_id <500  and i.status in (1,2,3,6) and l.release_status = 2) ;

select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid, a.id as aid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id join lots l on i.lot_id = l.id join article_types a on l.article_type_id = a.id where (md.number is not null and md.number <> '' and d.study_id = 19 and d.id = 317 and i.status not in (1,2,3,6)) or (md.name ='Depot5' and md.deleted='t' and d.study_id <500  and i.status in (1,2,3,6)) ;
